attributes.action: I would like to ban all single use plastics in the UK.
attributes.additional_details: By eliminating the product at the point of sale will help massively in people making the right choice. If we can all take small steps in the right direction, the impact on our future will be greatly beneficial.  We can make the changes now. Say no to single use plastics. Say yes to a brighter for us now and for the future generations.
attributes.background: I am slowly having my eyes opened to the environmental impact single use plastic is having on our planet. There are now many alternatives readily available for people to use. If there was no option to use the single use plastic then we would HAVE to use an alternative.
